references.name: Kylee Taylor
references.position: Executive Housekeeper at Landmark Resort and Spa
references.snippet:
"I have found her to be extremely reliable, very efficient, and hardworking. Yuliia demonstrates professionalism, integrity, enthusiasm, initiative and maturity every shift.

Yuliia would be a fantastic asset for any organisation that she wishes to pursue in the future. I couldn’t recommend Yuliia highly enough and would absolutely rehire her."
